newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Suncrush to unbundle Tempora, Ettington.
newsitem.headline: Suncrush to unbundle Tempora, Ettington.

text.p: Soft drink bottler Suncrush Ltd said on Tuesday it would distribute to shareholders its 49.8 percent shareholding in Tempora Investments Ltd and its 79.4 percent stake in Ettington Investments Ltd.
The market value of the holdings as of Monday's close was 619 million rand and 143 million rand respectively. Suncrush's market capitalisation was 1.93 billion rand.
